content.title: RHSA-2021:0531: container-tools:rhel8 security, bug fix, and enhancement update (Moderate)
content.description:
The container-tools module contains tools for working with containers, notably podman, buildah, skopeo, and runc.

Security Fix(es):

* podman: environment variables leak between containers when started via Varlink or Docker-compatible REST API (CVE-2020-14370)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

Additional Changes:

For detailed information on changes in this release, see the Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8.3 Release Notes linked from the References section.
